mapper.select: select dcts.*, dctjsr.sequence from devops_ci_template_job dctj join devops_ci_template_job_step_rel dctjsr on dctj.id = dctjsr.ci_template_job_id join devops_ci_template_step dcts on dcts.id = dctjsr.ci_template_step_id where (dctj.source_type = 'site' and dctj.source_id = 0) or (dctj.source_type = 'organization' and dctj.source_id = #{organizationId}) and dctjsr.ci_template_job_id = #{templateJobId} AND dcts.visibility=1

select dcts.* from devops_ci_template_step dcts where (dcts.source_type = 'site' and dcts.source_id = 0) or (dcts.source_type = 'organization' and dcts.source_id = #{organizationId}) or (dcts.source_type = 'project' and dcts.source_id = #{projectId}) AND dcts.visibility=1
